paragraphs: It's bad enough I'm stuck in this Divines-forsaken desert with these disgusting Goblin laborers no one will buy, but now my overseers are going missing! I have no idea where they're going or what's happening to them. I turn my back on those drunken fools for three seconds and I'm suddenly down two men!
If we keep going at this rate, we'll have to kill some of our labor stock just so we can keep them under control.
